I'd highly recommend watching "It's a Wonderful Life". This heartwarming film tells the story of George Bailey, played by James Stewart, who is shown what life would have been like if he had never existed by an angel. It's a classic that never fails to inspire and touch audiences.

Another unique choice could be "This Is Spinal Tap", a comedy rock-documentary about the band Spinal Tap, chronicling their fateful tour. This film, featuring a star-studded cast including Christopher Guest and Michael McKean, offers a humorous look at the absurdities of the music industry.
